text_block_list.text:
With the “SatsukiShou” approaching, Winning Ticket's training was 
upgraded to a more race-focused one.

In order to decorate the first important classic race with a 
white star, while I was thinking about the training menu, Winning 
Ticket the girl who will be running came to visit.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to bother you. Well, you don't have 
to worry about me, keep working.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Probably, It's tied up with the materials from the exhibition～…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh～, It's an old notebook～.

In the moment I decided to jump in and 
help with Winning Ticket's search
(Ring, Ring)
That's a call from the teacher.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The teacher…? Aha, the one who was awarded the URA!

It's been a long time since I've been in touch with you to 
congratulate you on that award. What's wrong… Hello?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“Yeah, are you doing well? You and this new girl seem to be 
making a fuss, so I decided to call”
Oh, Tickezou… So it's about Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“How is it going, do you think you can win? Derby is the pinnacle 
of the races, because all the powerhouses gather”

Of course we will win. The legacy that you left on the Derby is 
passed down to the team <Sirius>.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: “Haha! That's what I said at the awards ceremony”

Her feelings for the Derby are unparalleled. She's been thinking 
about the Derby ever since she was little after all.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: “Right, the strength of your feelings is important for the Derby”

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“I don't want to talk about spirituality, but I think the Derby 
is a race where strength and feelings collide”

Yeah… I saw the Derby live enough to be full, It has been 
transmitted to the extent that it is too much.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“Well, In the end I didn't end up winning, but the accumulation 
to this point was not in vain”

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: “I will expect you to have a good year, with your Derby”

After that, we talked about the team and the other members and 
finished the phone call with the teacher.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah～I was surprised. When my name suddenly 
came up, I wondered what was up.

He said “Say hello to Tickezou”. Because he knows about us and 
that you will make me a Derby trainer.

He said “Say hello to Tickezou”. Because he knows about us and 
that you will make me a Derby trainer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe～, leave it to me! The same for you Trainer-san you have to 
make a Derby Horse Girl!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Huh? If I'm going to win, or you have 
to let me win I don't know anymore.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, leaving that aside I have to keep searching! I used it at 
the time of the exhibition, so maybe around here～…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh! Here-here! Derby Note!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It seems I put it together with 
the materials from the exhibition.

When she showed me the notebook, I saw that the story of the 
Derby was perfectly written in young letters of Hiragana.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You see this is, what I thought about the Derby so far, and the 
feelings I had so far, and thenー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And it says the road to run in the Derby.
With that said, Winning Ticket put a photo print on the notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, now it's done!

Winning Ticket, Biwa Hayahide, Narita Taishinー Precious memories 
with friends are now attached to the notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
At the end of this sticker, there will be 
a picture of my Derby victory… Ehehe～.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: When I was little, my body was always hot blooded.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Mom was worried about me, she took me to watch all kinds of games 
in hopes I like one of the sports.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
“Sports make your body and mind strong!” Was what she used to 
say… wasn't she a powerful mother?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then, the first race I saw live with my mom was the Derby. I 
said it before, but it was so amazing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Those who are happy to win, those who run until 
the end in any situation without giving up, and 
the many cheers to honor the raceー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
On the way home, all I had in my head was about 
running. I went to various sports classes, but 
I told my mom I'd quit all of them.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
When I think about it now, I think I said it vaguely, but my 
mother said “Then I have to buy you a horseshoe”.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm not good at studying, but I was able to 
continue running. Thanks to the Derby, I was 
able to meet my friends and Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's why… I will make sure to win the Derby!

The dream you see as a child, it is never 
easy to keep running towards it.

However, Winning Ticket continued to aim for her dream even now. 
The Derby she saw that day made a new color for her.
choice_data_list: Let's make sure to write in the notebook that we won!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to make you stay so late, Trainer-san. When I talk about 
the Derby, I get hooked.
You really like the Derby, Tickezou.
You really like the Derby, Tickezou.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, that's obvious! When it comes down to 
my feelings for the Derby I won't lose!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right. I thought I'd take this and go home, but I'll 
give it to you Trainer-san.

With that said, what Winning Ticket 
handed down was the “Derby Note”.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I wrote everything about the Derby in it, so read it! I think 
Trainer-san's feelings for the Derby will become stronger now!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Then see you later! Good look with training!

After I saw off Winning Ticket, I took a 
look at the notebook that she gave me!

“Derby Note” written in big, young characters on the cover. I 
felt the criticality of it, on the contrary, it represented the 
strength of her feelings.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…!
Oh…? That is…

It was dark. Despite that, there was a Horse 
Girl who ran to the training course.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Aah… Alright, first let's start with 10 dashes.
Taishin… keeps up her training even if it gets late.

It's not just Winning Ticket that wants to win. For a Horse Girl, 
the Derby is a dream and a symbol of prosperity.

While staring at Narita Taishin's running in the dark, I was 
thinking about that.
